LinearStiffness: Scale of [0, 1] and applied to linear motion strength - linear stiffness works on their local frame
AngularStiffness: Scale of [0, 1] and applied to angular motion strength, xyz is applied to twist, swing1, swing2
AngularLimit: Angular delta limit of this joints local transform. [-Limit, Limit]
PoleVector: Pole Vector in their local space
OffsetRotation: this is offset rotation applied when constructing the local frame
